title: LinkedIn Study - Premium Usage, Networking and Job Success
description: Explored the impact of network activity and premium usage on job search strategies through hypothesis testing and statistical analysis in SPSS.

title: Top Scorer
description: A web-based file management system based on HDFS using MySQL, MongoDB, and Python to reduce file management time and analyze soccer player goal statistics.

title: Kayra
description: A mental health conversational chatbot based on Cognitive Therapy with 98.11% diagnostic accuracy.
